history.proof: intros n. induction n. - hauto l: on depth: 3. - hauto l: on depth: 3.

original: intros n. induction n. - simpl. apply Included_refl. - simpl. apply Included_trans with (LindenbaumChain n). ++ apply Lindenbaum_included_n_m. apply le_n. ++ apply Included_refl.
